src/lib/components/DashJbrowse.react.js.description:
DashJbrowse renders the JBrowse 2 React Linear Genome View.
Any JB2 LGV configuration is also valid configuration for this
component.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

assembly.description: The configuration for the assembly to use for the browser.

tracks.description: The tracks to use for the browser.

defaultSession.description: The default session to use for the browser.

location.description: The location to use for the browser.

aggregateTextSearchAdapters.description: The text search adapters to use for the browser

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
